overview: Mild mannered Evie Sanders works as a waitress at “The Black Diamond Bar" in Alpine, Colorado and is hopelessly in love with the bar’s owner/manager, Jace Winters. Though she’s been there for four years, she’s been too shy to make a move, but that all might change after she’s asked to fill out an anonymous “Naughty List” for her friend’s human sexuality class.
title: The Naughty List
